data.name: Lonza the Bounty Hunter Demo
data.detailed_description:
Lonza Chaku-Kwali has set out to defeat the wicked galactic king Otoyama, but must fight thousands of ships to get there. Help the infamous bounty hunter battle through it all and end the reign of terror.

For fans of shmups, fast-paced 2D action, bullet hells and twin-stick combat.

INCLUDES:

60 levels and 7 boss fights (18 levels & 2 boss fight available in demo)

3 gameplay styles: top-down, side-scrolling, arena (20 levels each)

endless arcade mode (available in demo)
